Package org.littleshoot.proxy

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BaseProxyTest
    Base for tests that test the proxy.
    ChainedProxyTest
    Tests a proxy chained to a downstream proxy.
    ChainedProxyWithFallbackTest
    Tests a proxy chained to a missing downstream proxy.
    EndToEndStoppingTest
    End to end test making sure the proxy is able to service simple HTTP requests and stop at the end.
    HttpFilterTest  
    HttpStreamingFilterTest  
    IdleTest
    Note - this test only works on UNIX systems because it checks file descriptor counts.
    PerformanceServer
    This launches a Jetty-based HTTP server that serves static files from the perfsite folder.
    SelfSignedSSLEngineSource
    Basic SSLEngineSource for unit testing.
    SimpleProxyTest
    Tests just a single basic proxy.
    TestUtils  
    ThrottledInputStream
    The ThrottleInputStream provides bandwidth throttling on a specified InputStream.
    UsernamePasswordAuthenticatingProxyTest
    Tests a single proxy that requires username/password authentication.
    VariableSpeedClientServerTest
    Tests cases where either the client or the server is slower than the other.
